product_name: CamelBak CamelBak Quick Link Conversion Kit
long_description: The CamelBak Quick Link conversion kit lets you retrofit any CamelBak OMEGA or Antidote reservoir (not included) with Quick Link components for easy, enhanced hydration. Includes Quick Link(TM) female connector with auto-shutoff and Quick Link male connector. By converting your reservoir connection, you can keep your tube routed through your pack and simply unclick and remove the reservoir for faster refills.
short_description: The CamelBak Quick Link conversion kit lets you retrofit any CamelBak OMEGA or Antidote reservoir (not included) with Quick Link components for easy, enhanced hydration.
